Open Terminal on your RedHat Linux virtual machine

Load 'Firefox' browser module
```{loading and launching Firefox}
$ module load firefox
$ firefox
```

Login to [Respublica OnDemand]<respublica-web.research.chop.edu>, select 'Interactive Apps' then 'RStudio'

Select the version, hours and computational power needed
Note: select a version of R instead of "current version".  When new versions are selected, all modules/packages have to be re-installed.

The page will refresh and give a "Connect to RStudio Server" option and open in Firefox.
